bibl.title: Aristotle's Works: The Possible Origins of the Alexandria Collection.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The fate of the Aristotelian corpus. - 2. Ancient lists of Aristotle's works held in Alexandria. - 3. The structure of the non-scientific works. - Conclusion. Appendix.

bibl.title: The Library of Alexandria, Centre of Learning in the Ancient World

bibl.seg: TANNER R.G., Aristotle's Works: The Possible Origins of the Alexandria Collection.
Roy MacLEOD (Ed.), The Library of Alexandria, Centre of Learning in the Ancient World (London - New York, 2000) pp. 79-91.
Introduction. - 1. The fate of the Aristotelian corpus. - 2. Ancient lists of Aristotle's works held in Alexandria. - 3. The structure of the non-scientific works. - Conclusion. Appendix.
